hanzi-su-wiki:
確

Значения

Проверять; точный, достоверный; прочный, твёрдый

Мнемоника

Стремясь разрушить покров 冖 клетки, птица 隹 клювом, словно камнем 石, полирует её прутья, Прочный, твёрдый (клюв). Проверять (прочны ли прутья).

Варианты

确
purpleculture_pinyin:
què
authenticated; solid; firm; real; true
аутентифицирован; твердый; твердый; настоящий; истинный
rtega_mnemonic:
確確RS
确确		sure, certain, real, true
  • a bird flying so high 隺 it's sure it can't be hit by a stone 石
  • ⓢ one is certain to be remarked when blowing a horn 角 and playing stone chimes 石
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 确)
Pictophonetic: 隺 indicates the sound; 石 (stone) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
確定 [ què dìng ]: definite; certain; fixed; to fix (on sth); to determine; to be sure; to ensure; to make certain; to ascertain; to clinch; to recognize; to confirm; OK (on computer dialog box)
確實 [ què shí ]: indeed; really; reliable; real; true
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 石 [ shí ] stone, rock, mineral
    • 隺 [ hú ] flying high; ambition
heisig_chinese_memo: If you want assurance that no one will get into the Turkey coop, put a huge reliable rock in front of the entrance.
heisig_constituent: assurance, stone, rock, turkeyhouse, house, turkey
heisig_story:
On the left you see the rock, which is familiar enough. But pay attention to the right. Taking careful note of the unusual stroke order that has the "chimney" on the house doubled up with the first stroke of the turkey, we may see the right side as a turkey house (or "coop").
We shall see this pattern only on one other occasion (Frame 2093), but even for these two characters it is well worth the trouble to single it out as a primitive.
myStory:
隺 means 'crane' or 'flying bird' and is a variant of 寉

селится на крышах домов
Keyword_KANJIDIC: assurance, firm, tight, hard, solid, confirm, clear, evident
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: гарантии, фирма, плотный, жесткий, твердый, подтверждают, ясно, очевидно,
koohiiStory1: To assure that no one will get into the Turkey coop, put a huge rock in the entrance!
koohiiStory2: You´ve heard the expression "killing two birds with one stone." (一石二鳥 is-seki-ni-chou). We´ll, there´s another one that roughly translates as "killing an entire coop with a giant boulder. " That´s the method that hunters use when they want absolute assurance of taking home a bird.

確信(かくしん): conviction, confidence
確定(かくてい): definition (math), decision, settlement
確保(かくほ): guarantee, ensure, maintain, insure, secure
確立(かくりつ): establishment
確り(しっかり): firmly, tightly, reliable, level-headed, steady
的確(てきかく): precise, accurate
適確(てきかく): precise, accurate

確認(かくにん): affirmation, confirmation
確率(かくりつ): probability
正確(せいかく): accurate, punctual, exact, authentic, veracious
確かめる(たしかめる): ascertain
明確(めいかく): clear up, clarify, define
確か(たしか): sure, certain
jp_readingExamples: 確か (たし.か), 確かめる (たし.かめる)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You take a stone to the forehead of a turkey. It is certain that you will damage it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Try hitting a sponge on a turkey's forehead. Not certain. Now a stone. Certain.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You're killing this turkey, and you need to make sure he's dead for certain. The reason you need to make sure this turkey is dead is because of the cock (かく) in your life. Male chickens get really jealous when turkeys are around.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: As you smash the stone into the turkey's forehead, yell out "This is for you, my cock! THIS IS FOR YOU!" Your cock lover watches from the shadows.
Ru_Meaning: assurance, firm, tight, hard, solid, confirm, clear, evident
Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 宀 (значок У), 石 (камень), 隹 (старая птица)
Ru_trainchinese:
què: (графема) точный, достоверный; твердый, непреклонный
què: (нареч) действительно, правда, конечно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the crane (隺) is stone (石), you're certain
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The new most reliable safes are those made from stone.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " stone ", "隺", it means firmness and hardness. "Jade Pian‧ Shibu": "Certainly, strong." "Zhuangzi‧ Yingdiwang": "True and then go, it is true that only those who can do the thing are done."

" Yes " can mean firmness and determination. Jin Yuanhong "Preface to Famous Ministers of the Three Kingdoms": "Dignified Kong Ming, Ji Yu Hongmiao... At the beginning of the Nine Dragon Plate, the elegant and precise."

" Indeed ," said true and accurate. "Xin Tang Book-Lu Congyuan Biography": "(Lu Congyuan) The number is used for the exam, the promotion and retreat are detailed."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " stone " and "隺", it means firmness and hardness.
humanum_full_description:
從「石」，「隺」聲，表示堅固、堅硬。《玉篇‧石部》：「確，堅固也。」《莊子‧應帝王》：「正而後行，確乎能其事者而已矣。」

　　「確」可表示堅定、堅決。晉袁宏〈三國名臣序贊〉：「堂堂孔明，基宇宏邈……初九龍盤，雅志彌確。」

　　「確」也表示真實、准確。《新唐書‧盧從願傳》：「（盧從愿）數充校考使，升退詳確。」
humanum_short_description: 從「石」，「隺」聲，表示堅固、堅硬。

從「 石 」，「 隺 」聲，表示堅固、堅硬。《玉篇‧石部》：「確，堅固也。」《莊子‧應帝王》：「正而後行，確乎能其事者而已矣。」 「 確 」可表示堅定、堅決。晉袁宏〈三國名臣序贊〉：「堂堂孔明，基宇宏邈……初九龍盤，雅志彌確。」 「 確 」也表示真實、准確。《新唐書‧盧從願傳》：「（盧從愿）數充校考使，升退詳確。」
From the sound of " stone", " 隺", it means firmness and hardness. "Jade Pian‧ Shibu": "Certainly, strong." "Zhuangzi‧ Yingdiwang": "True and then go, it is true that only those who can do the thing are done." " Yes" can mean firmness and determination. Jin Yuanhong "Preface to Famous Ministers of the Three Kingdoms": "Dignified Kong Ming, Ji Yu Hongmiao... At the beginning of the Nine Dragon Plate, the elegant and precise." " Indeed," said true and accurate. "Xin Tang Book-Lu Congyuan Biography": "(Lu Congyuan) The number is used for the exam, the promotion and retreat are detailed."

確字的基本解释

確
què
见“确”。

確字的汉语字典释义

[①]［què］
［《廣韻》苦角切，入覺，溪。］
“塙1”的今字。
(1)坚定；坚决。
(2)执著。
(3)真实；准确。
(4)见“確撞”。
(5)通“搉”、“榷”。参见“確商”、“確貨”。
(6)见“確青”。

確字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　確； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页833第31
【廣韻】苦角切【集韻】【韻會】克角切，?音䐨。堅也，靳固也。【易·乾卦】確乎其不可拔。【莊子·應帝王】確乎能其事。【註】堅貌。　又剛也。【易·繫辭】夫乾確然示人易矣。　亦作塙碻。

確字的源字形

què
см. 确
Radicals: 石, 冖, 隹  (stone, forehead, turkey)
Meaning Mnemonic
You take a stone to the forehead of a turkey. It is certain that you will damage it.
Try hitting a sponge on a turkey's forehead. Not certain. Now a stone. Certain.
Reading Mnemonic
You're killing this turkey, and you need to make sure he's dead for certain. The reason you need to make sure this turkey is dead is because of the cock (かく) in your life. Male chickens get really jealous when turkeys are around.
As you smash the stone into the turkey's forehead, yell out "This is for you, my cock! THIS IS FOR YOU!" Your cock lover watches from the shadows.
